segments.text: Excuse me , Professor . I am going to miss next week's class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is this something that you could schedule for another time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I have to do this ; it's important !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you arranged for someone to take notes for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've made arrangements with a friend to help me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know that I only allow one absence per semester , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Write down your name and the date on a piece of paper and give it to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , have a good day off from class .
segments.speaker: S2
